review_data.title: Drinks an der Nachmittagssonne
review_data.content: Nach einem Stadtbummel genossen wir hier die Nachmittagssonne. Angenehmer ruhiger Platz. Sehr schlichtes Kärtchen. Die Aussicht auf Limmatquai und die...More

review_data.title: Pleasant drinks in a square outside the theatre
review_data.content: We were with friends walking by the Limmat when we fancied a drink. Saw the tables and chairs in the square across the street so decided to investigate further. Whilst the square is right by the tram-line (trams 4 & 15), once you get into...More

review_data.title: Nice café/restaurant at Hechtplatz
review_data.content: One of more challenging places in the city of Zurich to review as the Hetchplatz Sommergarten is only open for two months of the year, July and August, and even then only on nice weather days. All of the tables on this partial square seating...More

review_data.title: Netter Ort im Niederdorf
review_data.content: Speisen waren alle gut. Baguette recht teuer, Röllchen und Hauptgericht dafür eher günstig. Menüauswahl eingeschränkt, aber das ist bei einem...More

review_data.title: Vietnamese!
review_data.content: This is great place that is only open in July and August. The vietnamese (and pan-asian..) food is tasty- The baguette with beef and egg was super yummy..

review_data.title: Great service, top location
review_data.content: We came for drinks and snacks after being refused by the Cedre right across Hechtplatz. What a relief receiving such great service and products - highly recommended.
